page_content:
# Planning Division

__

#### Department of Planning and Development Alert:

CONTACT INFORMATION:  Our offices are open 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m., Monday through Friday. 

__

703-324-1380 TTY 711

__

Email Us

__

12055 Government Center Parkway, Suite 730  
Fairfax, VA 22035

__

Kelly Atkinson  
Director

# Completed Work Program Plan Amendments

When the Board of Supervisors has acted upon an amendment, the amendment is considered adopted or completed. Adopted amendments are then reflected in the current Comprehensive Plan at the time of adoption.

## 

2017 Plan Edition
